mapper.select: SELECT MBR_ID, PWD, MBR_NM, EMAIL, MPNO, BD, SEX FROM member_info ORDER BY SUBS_DTM ASC
mapper.sql: SELECT MBR_ID, PWD, MBR_NM, EMAIL, MPNO, BD, SEX, AGRE_YN FROM member_info
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_info (MBR_NM, MBR_ID, PWD, BD, SEX, EMAIL, MPNO, AGRE_YN) VALUES (#{MBR_NM}, #{MBR_ID}, #{PWD}, #{BD}, #{SEX}, #{EMAIL}, #{MPNO}, #{AGRE_YN})
